name: Maze Game (itch) (TransGame668)
description:
There's a 5 level in this Game, To exit the level find the Yellow Trophy for win.

When you play the level make sure you Press "esc" to show the cursor, If you win, the main menu will unfunctional or the cursor still hiding.

Controls:

"W" for up, "A" for left, "S" for down, "D" for right

or Press "W" to Walk and Move the Mouse for Looking Around/Moving the Camera.
